channel.title: [Request Section]
channel.description: Well... in my opinion MoparScape needs a "Request Section" for the people of this great community, for instance, "I can't find DavidScape anywhere and I've searched everywhere!" *Posts a [REQ] in "Request Section" and someone has it, so they upload it and give them the link.

item.title: [Request Section]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

If no one remembers, there was actually a thread by one of the globals, or admins, that was stickied here (Or somewhere, I can’t remember) not too long ago about site suggestions. The thread was closed because of all the irrational request. If Moparscapers can’t even handle a request thread, there is no way Moparscapers could handle a whole section.

Read full topic

item.title: [Request Section]

item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

jmood128:

Yes lets add a way to gain fast posts.

item.title: [Request Section]
item.dc:creator: @Daniel8 Daniel™
item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:18, topic:406257”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=503255.msg3684940#msg3684940 date=1311788223]

Agreed
People already use every section as the request section, why not just make one so we can tell them to shut up and post it in the “official” request section. No one even has to answer their requests, we can just have a place for them to go to get our of our way.

I like your idea!

Waste of space then isn’t it. Why have something that clearly won’t have a purpose…

Not really a waste of space when there’s no limit on the amount of posts we can have, it would just be a section at the bottom that people could post in and no one would really have to answer, basically something like the client help section.

Then if no one is going to answer, Why have it. It then would become a waste of space.
[/quote]
It’s already a waste of space having it in every section, if we have one just for it at least it would be wasting space made just for it.[/quote]
Agreed

Read full topic

item.title: [Request Section]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Ok, every now and then, I touch server help.
I have absolutely NO Java experience, and have never attempted to edit or host a server.
That said, I use the search button and have been able to answer generally 9/10 questions. It’s not that hard.
Now, if you want some other kind of request, we’re not going to spoonfeed you. Use prior knowledge to assess a situation.

Read full topic
